feed.title: Portage la Prairie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Portage la Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Portage Southport Airport 1:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow or freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:16 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:16 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:16 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
